Bond

Where Little Minds Grow Big Ideas!

Bond is a fun, creative space for kids to write, color, and explore their feelings. From journals and mood trackers to reward charts and coloring pages, our printables make self-expression magical.

Bond also helps build stronger relationships between parents and children through shared creativity and reflection. So please download our printables and journals, and enjoy them together with your little ones.


Our Journals

Passport Journal

A travel journal is a fun way to remember adventures and trips! Kids can draw pictures, write about places they visit, and save memories like ticket stubs or funny moments along the way.

View & Print
Gratitude Journal

A gratitude journal is a special place to write about things we’re thankful for. It helps kids focus on the good in their lives, whether it’s a kind friend, a fun game, or a yummy dinner.

View & Print
Daily Journal

A daily journal helps kids build the habit of writing a little every day. They can share how they feel, what made them smile, or something they’re looking forward to. It’s a great way to reflect and grow.

View & Print
Summer journal

A summer journal is perfect for sunny days and school holidays! Children can write about what they did each day, doodle about their favorite summer activities, or track new things they’ve learned or tried.

View & Print
